snippet: The violinist Leonidas Kavakos and the pianist Enrico Pace are performing the complete Beethoven Violin Sonatas in three concerts as part of Carnegie Hall’s Vienna: City of Dreams festival.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of Beethoven sonatas performed by violinist Leonidas Kavakos and pianist Enrico Pace at Zankel Hall as part of Vienna: City of Dreams festival.
lead_paragraph: The violinist Leonidas Kavakos and the pianist Enrico Pace are performing the complete Beethoven Violin Sonatas in three concerts as part of Carnegie Hall’s Vienna: City of Dreams festival.

headline.seo: Leonidas Kavakos and Enrico Pace in Beethoven Violin Sonatas
headline.main: A Violinist and a Pianist Time Travel, Guided by a Virtuoso’s Whims
headline.print_headline: A Violinist and a Pianist Time Travel, Guided by a Virtuoso’s Whims
